definitions.definition: An evergreen plant, Calluna vulgaris , with spiky leaves and small purple, pink, or white flowers.
A plant in the family Ericaceae .
Various species of the genus Erica .
Various species of the genus Cassiope .
A purple colour with a tint of pink and blue.
The use of interwoven yarns of mixed colours to produce flecks .

main_definition: An evergreen plant, Calluna vulgaris , with spiky leaves and small purple, pink, or white flowers.
secondary_definitions: A plant in the family Ericaceae .
Various species of the genus Erica .
Various species of the genus Cassiope .
A purple colour with a tint of pink and blue.
( textiles ) The use of interwoven yarns of mixed colours to produce flecks .
